item.description:
Come on down for some short form improv silliness. Jason is off being an artist in the South this week, so I will be leading ya'll in some fun exercises and non-competitive games! If you have any games you would like to try, let me know.

No experience necessary!

The weather is supposed to be beautiful, so please bring all of your friends and join us for another sure to be fantastic outside Cambridge Improv Incubator!

Any questions or concerns, message me here :)

nikki
item.how_to_find_us: we will be in the backyard!
item.name: Improv! Because Good Thursday Night TV Doesn't Start Until September
